entry.title: 2022-10-04-quiz2
entry.summary:
There will be a QUIZ during your tutorial on Wednesday, the 12th of October, on the material taught after the first mid-semester examination. To prepare for the quiz, try the questions on surfaces that are posted under the second section of exercise set 3. You may discuss them with your course associates.


Last modified: 12:24 PM - 4 October, 2022

entry.title: 2022-09-15-slides
entry.summary:
The slides that were used to teach this course in 2021 are now available via the “Last year’s slides” link above. I am not using these slides this year, but you may find in them many of the topics that we are covering this year.

Last modified: 01:33 AM - 15 September, 2022
